item.title: Hermite's letters to Francisco Gomes Teixeira
item.description: arXiv:2502.19069v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: It is well known that Charles Hermite kept an intense correspondence with many of the word's leading mathematicians of his time. This paper focuses on Hermite's letters to Francisco Gomes Teixeira, a Portuguese mathematician, who exchanged letters with Hermite for more than twenty years.
item.dc:creator: Pedro J. Freitas
